content: It's important to remember. Sometimes your words may be forgiven but they cannot be forgotten.. Are your words worth it?

author: ddlovato
content: And sometimes grudges aren't meant to be held but when words cut deep enough... It makes it really hard to move on.

author: ddlovato
content: Compassion and empathy are key character traits to have in order to rebuild all relations with others.

author: ddlovato
content: Maybe the next time you want to cut someone down... Take a second to listen to what they have to say. Life's too short to be mean.. âœŒğŸ¼ï¸

author: ddlovato
content: Surround yourself with those who pick you up when others put you down.

author: ddlovato
content: Btw.... Excited to get back in the studio in days.... Are you guys ready for album #5??? ğŸ˜œ

author: ddlovato
content: I've never been more confident in my sound. Never been so sure of who I am as an artist. Never felt this hungry and driven...

author: ddlovato
content: I can't describe my new sound... The only word that comes to mind is authentic. Very very authentic to who I am & the voice I have inside..

author: ddlovato
content: What I can say is this will be my best work yet... Already game changing music and I've barely scratched the surface on creating this album.

author: ddlovato
content: I am going to sing my heart out more than I've ever sang before.. To the sound that I've spent my whole life trying to identify.. I'm ready.

author: ddlovato
content: Fuck trying to make music that will appeal to the masses for the sake of hit songs. It's time to share my lane... MY SOUND.. Because no one

author: ddlovato
content: can take away my individuality or copy my best work which my fans deserve to see. I'm sorry it took so long to figure out MY channel but

author: ddlovato

content: Just met a man named Sonny. 7 months sober and homeless yet he's doing everything not to drink regardless of his living situation.. It made

author: ddlovato
content: me sad to listen to him talk about people judging him for being homeless and it made me want to tell you guys.. Never judge others..

author: ddlovato
content: Especially homeless people. They could be suffering from a mental illness, running away because of the things they've experienced at home

author: ddlovato
content: Really anything.. So next time you begin to judge someone at first glance.. Just remember, you have no idea what they are going through and

author: ddlovato
content: a single smile can change someone's future. Spread love not hate and #prayforsonny

content: We live in a world obsessed with "celebrity". Please don't elect one for President. #ImWithHer

author: ddlovato
content: All I'm saying is, the others all have experience being politicians...

author: ddlovato
content: We just need to remind ourselves that this race isn't one big reality show.. This is our country's future. What is best for the US?

author: ddlovato
content: Everyone's entitled to their own opinions and beliefs. No judgement. But no matter what party you are for, we have to do what's best for our

author: ddlovato
content: Personally, #ImWithHer. Unapologetically. You can be for whoever you want.. Just check your intentions. Ya know?

author: ddlovato
content: country. It's a scary thought thinking about where our country could be if people don't chose what's best for us.

author: ddlovato
content: I also wish that this election didn't run on such negative energy. Like bad reality tv..

author: ddlovato
content: Frustrating to see women come forward with their past only to be shot down, not believed & disrespected for their bravery in taking action

author: ddlovato
content: Happens way too often. I'm ready for women to be taken just as seriously as men..

author: ddlovato
content: Someone tell me why anyone would ever feel brave enough to come forward if they are most likely to be ignored or called a liar?

author: ddlovato
content: I'm also ready for self-proclaimed feminists to start speaking out or taking action for women's rights.

author: ddlovato
content: Women empowerment is speaking up for other women even when it's something uncomfortable to speak up about.

author: ddlovato
content: Women empowerment is using your voice to help the voiceless women be heard.

author: ddlovato
content: Women empowerment is taking action now, not when it's convenient.

author: ddlovato
content: Women empowerment is leading other women to make actual changes in our society.

author: ddlovato
content: Women empowerment is tweeting at 2:30 am knowing the consequences of these tweets and not giving a single fuck. ğŸ˜‚

author: ddlovato
content: Okay I'm really tired.. Going to bed. Love you all. #equalityforALL (not just women) ğŸ‘ŠğŸ¼ğŸ’—
